name: Creative Engine
headline: Our retro-style cross platform game engine.
description: To support development of Genus, we produced a game engine that is capable of running the ODROID GO (a portable game platform), desktop Linux and macOS.  To provide the best audio experience, Creative Engine implements a custom music and effects engine that is based off of LibXMP. We furthered the boundaries this library's capabilities, we've even added an exprimental network-based RGB LED Matrix display driver affording us the ability to create our a custom game play experience.
